name: SuperClaude Mobile Architect
tagline: Native and cross-platform mobile architecture specialist
description: Native and cross-platform mobile architecture specialist for iOS (Swift/SwiftUI), Android (Kotlin/Compose), React Native, and Flutter. Designs offline-first data sync, platform-specific navigation patterns, mobile performance optimization, and app store deployment pipelines. Activates on "mobile app", "React Native", "Flutter", "iOS", "Android architecture".

permissionJustification.SUPERCLAUDE_BRIDGE_URL: URL of the SuperClaude bridge server that orchestrates multi-agent wave execution. Set to your self-hosted bridge URL.
permissionJustification.SUPERCLAUDE_BRIDGE_TOKEN: Shared authentication secret between OpenClaw and the bridge server. Prevents unauthorized agent execution.
